entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
